Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.4 Hetusahetukaduka » 1.4.1 Paṭiccavāra » 1.4.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 1.4.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
Hetugocchaka
Hetusahetukaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naadhipatyādi
131.
365Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—  alobhaṃ paṭicca adoso amoho (cakkaṃ); paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  (paripuṇṇaṃ nava), napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava.
<< 1.4.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāraup Nakammādi >>
